subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Porzingis, who has often been compared to the Mavericks’ Nowitzki, faced him for the first time and played well, scoring 28 points, but Dallas prevailed.
snippet: The Knicks’ Porzingis, who has often been compared to the Mavericks’ Nowitzki, faced him for the first time and played well, scoring 28 points, but Dallas prevailed.
